definition: Robin Li (1968-), founder and CEO of Baidu 百度, a PRC Internet company

sentences.english: The China that held a few days ago IT cacique peak is met, li Yan grand such say.

definition: Ma Huateng aka Pony Ma (1971-), Chinese business magnate, CEO of Tencent
Kai-Fu Lee (1961-), Taiwanese computer scientist and IT executive, founding president of Google China 2005-2009
Guo "Terry" Taiming (1950-), prominent Taiwanese businessman, founder of Foxconn
Frank Chang-ting Hsieh (1946-), Taiwanese DPP politician, mayor of Kaohsiung 1998-2005
